metadata.title: CVE-2020-9746 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Adobe Flash Player version 32.0.0.433 (and earlier) are affected by anexploitable NULL pointer dereference vulnerability that could result in acrash and arbitrary code execution. Exploitation of this issue requires anattacker to insert malicious strings in an HTTP response that is by defaultdelivered over TLS/SSL.

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
